metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25592 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In SaltStack Salt through 3002, salt-netapi improperly validates eauth credentials and tokens. A user can bypass authentication and invoke Salt SSH.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
